about_the_game:
--Story--[/h2]
This is the story of two girls, Saki and Kaede, who have been transferred to another world, Extasia. The girls fight to the death against "magic weapons" in order to return home from a world where magic is rife. An adventure that begins with an encounter with a mysterious talking wolf. What is the fate of Saki and Kaede...? And the mystery of the disasters that occur in the world is approached.

"I'm just interested in all the possibilities of your future."

--System--

The game is an exploration 2D action RPG in which you control two protagonists who work together to fight the powerful enemies that await you.
・Hundreds of combinations of magic that can be customised at will.
・The skill tree allows you to enhance your fighting style.
・Nimble controls.
・Analysis of the behaviour patterns of enemies and countermeasures.

name: Arcana Dimension Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: ４ GB available space
